start.text: You stand at the entrance of a dark cave. The air is cool and damp. What do you do?

inside_cave.text: Inside the cave, you see two paths. One leads deeper into darkness, while the other seems to have a faint light at the end.

outside.text: You find some interesting footprints leading away from the cave.

choices.text: Go back to the cave entrance

dark_path.text: You discover an ancient treasure chest!

light_path.text: You emerge into a beautiful garden filled with strange plants.

footprints.text: The footprints lead you to a small village where you're welcomed as a hero.
